text: The full "dream crazy" Nike ad is an outstanding piece. OK - its an ad (with all that that means)- but its also a beautifully shot and structured counterpoint to the increasing intolerance of 'other' in society. Powerful stuff IMHO. PS - Universities should be this confident.
